meanings.definition: A design or illustration carved into linoleum for printing.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to make a linocut in art class.
meanings.sent2: The linocut of a flower turned out beautifully on the paper.
meanings.sent3: The linocut of a cat wearing sunglasses made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her linocut of a city skyline was a striking piece of art.
meanings.sent5: The linocut of a bird in flight was so vivid and detailed.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a print from a linoleum block.
meanings.sent1: The linocut process involves carving the design into linoleum.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the creative challenge of making a linocut.
meanings.sent3: During the linocut workshop, we accidentally made a mess with ink.
meanings.sent4: The linocut process felt like turning a block of linoleum into magic.
meanings.sent5: His linocut technique was so precise and impressive.
